# Cécile ROGER - Ostéopathe Website

Professional showcase website for an osteopath based in Sion-les-Mines, France. Built with Astro 5 and Tailwind CSS 4.

## Tech Stack
- Framework: Astro 5
- Styling: Tailwind CSS 4 (Vite plugin)
- Language: TypeScript
- Deployment: Docker/Nginx

## Key Project Rules (AI Context)
- **Git Hooks:** Commit messages MUST follow Conventional Commits.
- **Branching:** Branch names MUST follow `^(((feature|fix|renovate)\/..+)|master)$`.
- **A11y:** Text contrast must be >= 4.5:1.
- **SEO: ** Every page must have a unique `title` (max 60 chars) and `description`.
- **Mobile UI:** Maintain the sticky "Prendre RDV" button on mobile (`md:hidden`).
- **Media:** Use `loading="lazy"` for all non-hero images. Use `fetchpriority="high"` for the hero image in `index.astro`.

## Project Structure
- `src/pages/`: Contains all routes (`index`, `qui-suis-je`, `deroulement`, `tarifs`, `faq`).
- `src/layouts/Layout.astro`: Global layout containing JSON-LD, Google Fonts, and Canonical URL logic.
- `src/components/`: Reusable components like `Navbar` and `Footer`.

## Useful Links
- [Contributing Guidelines](./CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [Astro Documentation](https://docs.astro.build)
- [Tailwind CSS Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com)
